GSD.product_version: versions from v2.6.36 to before v4.14.298
GSD.description:
mmc: core: Fix kernel panic when remove non-standard SDIO card

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.14.298 by commit b3275dde570b6420106a715bb58a0af041b94d95, it was introduced in version v2.6.36 by commit 6f51be3d37dff73cf8db771df4169f4c2f1cbf66. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: mmc: core: Fix kernel panic when remove non-standard SDIO card
